summary:
********
EWIs New Fog Effect
********
********
This Texture Set adding new Graphics
with higher Resolution and Detail to the vanilla Game and gives
the Fog effect a new and realistic look.

resolution: 1k
density and brightness reduced. original was always damned bright with or without enb.
descriptionHtml:
[url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net][img]http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/01logoh08mxy6kc4.jpg[/img][/url]
[size=4][center]********
EWIs New Fog Effect
****************
This Texture Set adding new Graphics
with higher Resolution and Detail to the vanilla Game and gives
the Fog effect a new and realistic look.

resolution: 1k
density and brightness reduced. original was always damned bright with or without enb.
this problem is fixed now.
********
install:
using your favorite mod manager or extract to your skyrim main folder.
enjoy.
ewi65
********
